intro: ^Technician: Yes sir. Can I help you?
^What do you know about the necklace incident? Did you steal the necklace?
^The maid told me to talk to you about what really happend with the necklace incident.
agg: ^Technician: Look I don't know who told you what. But I never stole that necklace. But I guess I should explain what happened.
soft: ^Technician: I hate talking about it. But ok. What do you want to know?
^I heard you were accused of stealing the necklace.
ending: ^Technician: Maybe you should go and talk to the technician yourself. After all, he was blamed for stealing the necklace along with me.
